sentence: The hotel staff was accommodating
All the staff was extremely friendly and went above and beyond to make your stay luxurious
Spa is beautiful attendants there amazing
i would recommend Red Frog beach in panama it is quiet and great service great price visit the website today for more info
Overall the staff at this hotel was among the best trained we ever experienced
The staff is always friendly and helpful and the rooms are spotless with up to date furnishings
Wonderful hotel with perfect service
Beautiful resort with top notch service

As soon as that happened one of the employees from the JW Mariot on the beach came and closed everyone ’s umbrella on the beach and said that because the 1 or 2 umbrellas flew off he had to close them all
Indeed every staff member we encountered had a smile and a greeting for us
Breakfast staff was very friendly and due to the number of people we ended up eating in Ario which seemed to have been set up as the overflow breakfast restaurant
So there are the three starsNow back to the front desk upon arrival my Daughter
My one and only thanks goes to Hope in the private concierge lounge that I was never made aware of till check out
Our first morning I called the front desk to request a microwave
but nothing says welcome home better than the huge bear hug I received from Raul Quin ’s Beach Staff
Customer service is above and beyond anything I have ever experienced
But overall the positives outweighed the negatives and the friendly staff made all the difference in making it a very nice weekend

Also wish to give a Shout out for wonderful service to EMA at check in the Housekeeping team Everyone at Maia including GUILERMO the Hostesses and the Omlet making ladies DONNA at Quin ’s and ANTHONY at Kane
However it was a very big deal to the staff at this JW
Laura and Toni did a better job of crowd control than other pool attendants did
The food is generally good and the service is above average
The housekeeping service was excellent in the room but there was literally trash everywhere else
I want to say THANK YOU to Gia from food service who tried her best to help my wife give my stubborn 4 year old her Motrin
One of the attendants finally came over to talk to us
We did leave some valuables out the 4th night only to have turndown service come
At check in however the front desk took issue with our request yet why else would we have booked 2 rooms since they did not have it in their system

We rented one for a day and we were intruded upon by hotel staff noisily setting up a convention activity immediately behind us trucks beeping in reverse loud clanging of furniture being unloaded loud conversation
You will not get service commensurate with the price you pay
Disappointed in front desk staff

Towels are supplied as long as you have towel cards although the staff were very inconsistent about how they accepted or returned pool cards leaving us confused as to what the purpose of the cards was
With that being said the staff do a masterful job of keeping it clean and in pristine shape
Everything was perfect and every member of the staff we dealt with we ’d give a perfect 10 rating
Somehow the staff at JW Mariot on Marco Island out did our expectations
We were VERY impressed with not only the resort itself but the service here is outstanding probably one of the best service I have gotten ever
